text.en:
Oshi Skill holo power -2: "Yellow Enhance"
(Once per turn) One of your Yellow holomems' Arts gains +20 power until the end of this turn.

SP Oshi Skill holo power -2: "Birthday Gift ~Yellow~"
(Once per game) Reveal 1 Yellow holomem from your deck and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

Oshi Skill holo power -3: "Squeeze squeeze"
(Once per turn) Change the remaining HP of your opponent's Center holomem to 50.

SP Oshi Skill holo power -2: "I'll crush you"
(Once per game) One of your holomems' Arts gains +50 power until the end of this turn. If it's a White holomem, their Arts gain an additional +50 power until the end of this turn.

Oshi Skill holo power -2: "Guardian of Civilization"
(Once per turn) Can be used during your opponent's turn when one of your holomems with #Promise is about to take damage: reduce that damage by 50.

SP Oshi Skill holo power -2: "Amazing Drawing"
(Once per game) Reveal 1 Event card from your Deck and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your Deck.

Oshi Skill holo power -2: "Survival Power"
(Once per turn) Reveal 1 Stone Axe from your deck and attach it to one of your Green holomems. Then shuffle your deck.

SP Oshi Skill holo power -2: "Song of the Earth"
(Once per game) If your Center holomem is Green, restore all of their HP.

Oshi Skill holo power -2: "Nousagis~"
(Once per turn) Can be used during your opponent's turn when one of your holomems is Downed: move all Green Cheers from that holomem between your other holomems in any way you like.

SP Oshi Skill holo power -3: "Lucky Rabbit"
(Once per game) During this turn, treat all dice rolls as if the result was 6.

Oshi Skill holo power -X: "Executive's Orders"
(Once per turn) Can be used when you use a Red holomem's Ability or Arts that Archives cards from your hand: you may choose to Archive any number of them from your holo power instead of your hand.

SP Oshi Skill holo power -2: "Hawkeye"
(Once per game) During your opponent's next turn their Center and Collab holomem cannot move, Baton Pass, or switch.

text.en:
Oshi Skill holo power -2: "Phoenix Tail"
(Once per turn) Return 1 holomem from your Archive to your hand.

SP Oshi Skill holo power -2: "Rise from the ashes"
(Once per game) Can be used during your opponent's turn when any of your Red holomems is Downed: lose 1 less LIFE than you normally would. Then choose a holomem that was Downed and put that holomem, and all holomems stacked under it, into your hand.

[there is also a SEC version available, which is a signed version of the OUR]

Oshi Skill holo power -2: "comet"
(Once per turn) Can be used when any of your Blue holomems, or this Oshi holomem, deal damage to one of your opponent's Back holomems: deal 50 special damage to that Back holomem.

SP Oshi Skill holo power -2: "Shooting Star"
(Once per game) Can be used when any of your Blue holomems deal damage to your opponent's Center or Collab holomem: deal an equal amount of special damage to one of your opponent's Back holomems.

[there is also a SEC version available, which is a signed version of the OUR]

Oshi Skill holo power -1: "Rain Shamanism"
(Once per turn) Can be used when you Archive Cheer using any of your Blue holomems' Abilities or Arts: deal 20 special damage to any of your opponent's holomems.

SP Oshi Skill holo power -3: "Praying for rain"
(Once per game) Send 1-5 Cheers from your Archive between your holomems with #ID in any way you like.

text.en:
Collab Effect: "Clue Discovery"
You may return 1 Item from your Archive to your hand.

Arts: "Elementary, isn't it?"
Cost: 2 any color
Power: 20

Extra: This holomem cannot Bloom.

This card can only be played if you have 6 or fewer cards in your hand, excluding this card.

Look at the top four cards of your Deck. Reveal any number of them that are holomems with #Song and put them into your hand. Then put the remaining cards on the bottom of your Deck in any order.

To play this card, you must Archive one holo power.

Reveal a Debut or 1st Bloom holomem from your deck (excluding Buzz holomem) that is the same color as your oshi holomem, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
Reveal a Debut holomem from your deck and put it onto your Stage. Then shuffle your deck.

To play this card, you must Archive one holo power.

Reveal 1 Cheer from your Cheer Deck that is the same color as one of your holomems, and send that Cheer to any of your holomems. Then shuffle your Cheer Deck.
Switch your Center holomem with one of your Back holomems who is not Resting.
Shuffle 1-3 Cheers from your Archive into your Cheer Deck.
Switch your opponent's Center holomem with one of their Back holomems.

name.en: The Story of the Moon and the Rabbit

text.en:
This card can only be played if you have 6 or fewer cards in your hand, excluding this card.

Look at the top four cards of your Deck. Reveal any number of them that are holomems named Usada Pekora or Moona Hoshinova and put them into your hand. Then put the remaining cards on the bottom of your Deck in any order.

Roll a dice: if the result is 3 or less, Archive one of your opponent's holomems' Cheers.

If your Oshi holomem is Nanashi Mumei, you may instead perform the following effect: (Once per game) Archive 2 of your opponent's Center holomem's Cheers.

This card can only be played if you have 6 or fewer cards in your hand, excluding this card.

Look at the top four cards of your Deck. Reveal any number of them that are holomems with #IDGen3 and put them into your hand. Then put the remaining cards on the bottom of your Deck in any order.
Roll a dice: if the result is 4 or more, deal 20 special damage to one of your opponent's Back holomems. (holomems Downed with this effect do not reduce LIFE)

This card can only be played if you have 6 or fewer cards in your hand, excluding this card.

Look at the top four cards of your Deck. Reveal any number of them that are holomems with #Promise and put them into your hand. Then put the remaining cards on the bottom of your Deck in any order.

The Arts of the holomem with this Tool attached gain +20 power.

After the holomem with this Tool attached uses an Art, that holomem takes 10 special damage.

If this is attached to a 1st Bloom or later Aki Rosenthal, it gains the following effect: (once per turn) when the holomem with this Tool attached has their HP restored, draw 1 card from your Deck.

You may only attach 1 Tool to a holomem.

The Arts of the holomem with this Tool attached gain +10 power.

If this is attached to a 1st Bloom or later Hoshimachi Suisei, it gains the following effect: when the holomem with this Tool attached Downs one of your opponent's holomems, send the top card of your Cheer Deck to this holomem.

You may only attach 1 Tool to a holomem.

The Arts of the holomem with this Mascot attached gain +10 power.

If this is attached to Amane Kanata, it gains the following effect: (Once per turn) During your opponent's turn, when the holomem with this Mascot attached takes damage, deal 20 special damage to your opponent's Center holomem.

You may only attach 1 Mascot to a holomem.

The Arts of the holomem with this Mascot attached gain +10 power.

If this is attached to Nanashi Mumei, it gains the following effect: during your opponent's turn, when the holomem with this Mascot attached is about to take damage, you may Archive this mascot to reduce that damage by 30.

You may only attach 1 Mascot to a holomem.

The holomem with this Mascot attached has +10 HP.

If this is attached to Tokino Sora, it gains the following effect: when the holomem with this Mascot attached uses an Art, this Mascot is treated as 1 White Cheer.

You may only attach 1 Mascot to a holomem.

The holomem with this Mascot attached has +10 HP.

If this is attached to Aki Rosenthal, it gains the following effect: after the holomem with this Mascot attached uses an Art, restore 10 HP to one of your holomems.

You may only attach 1 Mascot to a holomem.

The Arts of the holomem with this Mascot attached gain +10 power.

If this is attached to Takane Lui, it gains the following effect: after the holomem with this Mascot attached uses an Art in the Center Position, draw 1 card from your Deck.

You may only attach 1 Mascot to a holomem.

Whenever the holomem with this Mascot attached takes damage while in the Center or Collab position, it takes -10 damage.

If this is attached to Takanashi Kiara, it gains the following effect: when the Bloom level of the holomem that this Mascot is attached to increases, draw 1 card from your Deck.

You may only attach 1 Mascot to a holomem.

During your opponent's turn, when the holomem with this Fan attached is Downed, send the top card of your Cheer Deck to one of your Aki Rosenthals.

This Fan may only be attached to your Aki Rosenthal, and you may attach any number of this Fan to one holomem.

When you roll dice as part of the Abilities or Arts of the holomem with this Fan attached, you may Archive this Fan for the following effect: re-roll all dice rolled as part of this ability.

This Fan may only be attached to your Usada Pekora, and you may attach any number of this Fan to one holomem.

During your opponent's turn, when the holomem with this Fan attached is Downed, move 1 Cheer from that holomem to another of your holomems.

This Fan may only be attached to your AZKi, and you may attach any number of this Fan to one holomem.

When you attach this Fan from your hand to a holomem, you may Archive 1 card from your hand for the following effect: draw 1 card from your Deck.

This Fan may only be attached to your Takanashi Kiara, and you may attach any number of this Fan to one holomem.

When the holomem with this Fan attached uses an Art, this Fan is treated as 1 Red Cheer.

Whenever the holomem with this Fan attached is about to take damage, add +10 to that damage.

This Fan may only be attached to your Omaru Polka, and you may attach any number of this Fan to one holomem.

Oshi Skill holo power -2: "Mascot creation"
(Once per turn) Reveal 1 Mascot from your Deck and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your Deck.

SP Oshi Skill holo power -2: "Fubukingdom"
(Once per game) Can be used when any of your White holomems Downs an opponent's holomem: you may roll one dice for each 2 Mascots attached to your holomems: if you roll one or more odd numbers, your opponent loses 1 LIFE.

[there is also a SEC version available, which is a signed version of the OUR]

Oshi Skill holo power -2: "HALU"
(Once per turn) Archive a Green Cheer from one of your holomems, then reveal a Cheer from your Cheer Deck and send it to any of your holomems. Then shuffle your Cheer Deck.

SP Oshi Skill holo power -2: "A Colorful Feast"
(Once per game) The Arts of each of your holomems with #IDGen2 gain +20 power for each color of Cheer attached to that holomem, until the end of this turn.

Oshi Skill holo power -3: "Ahoy!"
(Once per turn) Make one of your holomems with #Gen3 who has Bloomed this turn, Bloom again using a holomem in your hand.

SP Oshi Skill holo power -2: "Shukkou!"
(Once per game) If your Center holomem is Houshou Marine, deal 50 special damage for each holomem stacked under that holomem to your opponent's Center or Collab holomem.

[there is also a SEC version available, which is a signed version of the OUR]

Oshi Skill holo power -1: "poepoepoe~"
(Once per turn) Can be used if your Center holomem is Sakamata Chloe: look at the top 3 cards of your Deck. You may Archive all 3 cards, or return them to the top of your Deck in any order.

SP Oshi Skill holo power -3: "Life Reset Button"
(Once per game) Count the number of cards in your hand, then shuffle all cards in your hand and all holomems in your Archive into your Deck. Then, for each card you returned from your hand to your Deck, draw one card from your Deck.

[there is also a SEC version available, which is a signed version of the OUR]

Oshi Skill holo power -1: "Neeeeeee"
(Once per turn) Can be used when you roll dice as part of the Ability or Arts of your Murasaki Shion: re-roll the dice.

SP Oshi Skill holo power -2: "Shion's Amazing Magic"
(Once per game) Can be used when your Purple Center holomem uses an Art: for each Cheer attached to your opponent's Center holomem, deal 50 special damage to your opponent's Center holomem.

Oshi Skill holo power -2: "Zombie Tactics"
(Once per turn) Bloom one of your holomems with #IDGen2 using a holomem from your Archive.

SP Oshi Skill holo power -2: "Ollie resurrection"
(Once per game) Draw 4 cards, then Archive 2 cards from your hand. Then, you may Bloom one of your holomems using a holomem from your Archive.

Oshi Skill holo power -2: "Sampling"
(Once per turn) Archive 2 cards from your hand to return 2 holomems with #EN from your Archive to your hand.

SP Oshi Skill holo power -2: "Shinigami Rap"
(Once per game) Can be used if your Center holomem is Mori Calliope: during this turn, after using an Art, one of your holomems named Mori Calliope may repeat that Art once.

Arts: "Kon kon kitsune!"
Cost: 1 any color
Power: 30

Extra: You may put any number of copies of this holomem in your Deck.

Gift: "Oha-kon kitsune!"
(Collab position only) The Arts of all of your holomems with a Mascot attached gain +10 power.

Arts: "Otsu-kon-deshita"
Cost: 1 White
Power: 20

text.en:
Gift: "What happened?"
At the end of your opponent's Performance Step, if you lost any LIFE during that Performance Step, you may send 1 Cheer from your Archive to this holomem.

Arts: "Diva Otonose Kanade-san"
Cost: 1 Yellow, 3 any color
Power: 120

Extra: When this holomem is Downed, lose 2 LIFE.

To play this card, you must Archive one holo power.

Reveal a 1st Bloom holomem that is the same color as your Oshi holomem from your Deck and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your Deck.

Look at the top four cards of your deck. Reveal up to 1 Debut holomem and up to 1 1st Bloom holomem from among them and put them into your hand. Then put the remaining cards on the bottom of your Deck in any order.
Reveal 1-2 Debut holomems with the Extra text "You may put any number of copies of this holomem in your Deck" from your Deck and put them on your Stage. Then shuffle your Deck.
Move 1 Cheer from one of your holomems to another.

This card can only be played if you have less LIFE than your opponent.

If your opponent has no Collab holomem, they choose one of their Back holomems and move it to the Collab Position (this is not treated as Collabing).
Reveal 1 Fan from your Deck and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your Deck.
Look at the top four cards of your Deck. Reveal any number of them that are Debut holomems and put them into your hand. Then put the remaining cards on the bottom of your Deck in any order.

This card can only be played if you have 6 or fewer cards in your hand, excluding this card.

Look at the top four cards of your Deck. Reveal any number of them that are holomems with #IDGen1 and put them into your hand. Then put the remaining cards on the bottom of your Deck in any order.

This card can only be played if you have 6 or fewer cards in your hand, excluding this card.

Look at the top four cards of your Deck. Reveal any number of them that are holomems with #Gen0 and put them into your hand. Then put the remaining cards on the bottom of your Deck in any order.

This card can only be played if you have 6 or fewer cards in your hand, excluding this card.

Look at the top four cards of your Deck. Reveal any number of them that are holomems with #Gen4 and put them into your hand. Then put the remaining cards on the bottom of your Deck in any order.

This card can only be played if you have 6 or fewer cards in your hand, excluding this card.

Look at the top four cards of your Deck. Reveal any number of them that are holomems with #Shooter and put them into your hand. Then put the remaining cards on the bottom of your Deck in any order.

If this is attached to a Debut or Spot holomem, it gains the following effects:
- The holomem with this Tool attached has +30 HP.
- The holomem with this Tool attached does not take special damage from your opponent.

You may only attach 1 Tool to a holomem.

The Arts of the holomem with this Tool attached gain +10 power.

If this is attached to a 1st Bloom or later holomem with #Shooter, it gains the following effect: special damage done by this holomem to a single opposing holomem is increased by +10.

You may only attach 1 Tool to a holomem.

The Arts of the holomem with this Tool attached gain +10 power.

If this is attached to a 1st Bloom or later Otonose Kanade, it gains the following effect: when the holomem with this Tool attached Downs one of your opponent's holomems, draw 1 card from your Deck.

You may only attach 1 Tool to a holomem.

The holomem with this Mascot attached has +20 HP.

If this is attached to Sakura Miko, it gains the following effect: when the holomem with this Mascot attached collabs, draw 1 card from your Deck.

You may only attach 1 Mascot to a holomem.

The Arts of the holomem with this Mascot attached gain +10 power.

If this is attached to Sakura Miko, it gains the following effect: when the holomem with this Mascot attached collabs, if your Center holomem is Sakura Miko that holomem's Arts gain +10 power until the end of this turn.

You may only attach 1 Mascot to a holomem.

The holomem with this Mascot attached has +20 HP.

If this is attached to Fuwawa Abyssgard or Mococo Abyssgard, it gains the following effect: the Cheer requirements of all Arts of the holomem this is attached to become Colorless.

You may only attach 1 Mascot to a holomem.

The holomem with this Mascot attached has +20 HP.

If this is attached to Tokoyami Towa, it gains the following effect: special damage done by this holomem to a single opposing holomem is increased by +10.

You may only attach 1 Mascot to a holomem.

The Arts of the holomem with this Mascot attached gain +10 power.

If this is attached to Inugami Korone, it gains the following effect: when the holomem with this Mascot attached collabs, you may send 1 Yellow Cheer from your Archive to that holomem.

You may only attach 1 Mascot to a holomem.

The Arts of the holomem with this Mascot attached gain +10 power.

If this is attached to Inugami Korone, it gains the following effect: when the holomem with this Mascot attached is Downed, you may Archive one holo power to return this Mascot to your hand.

You may only attach 1 Mascot to a holomem.

The Arts of the holomem with this Mascot attached gain +10 power.

If this is attached to Ayunda Risu, it gains the following effect: when the holomem with this Mascot attached Collabs, you may move 1 Cheer from any of your holomems to that holomem.

You may only attach 1 Mascot to a holomem.

During your opponent's turn, when the holomem with this Fan attached is about to take damage, you may Archive this Fan to reduce that damage by 30.

This Fan may only be attached to your Himemori Luna, and you may attach any number of this Fan to one holomem.

When the holomem with this Mascot attached Archives Cheer as part of their Ability or Arts, you may Archive this Fan instead of one Cheer.

This Fan may only be attached to your Shishiro Botan, and you may attach any number of this Fan to one holomem.

When the holomem with this Fan attached uses an Art, this Fan is treated as 1 Red Cheer.

When the holomem with this Fan attached is Downed, your opponent may draw 1 card from their Deck.

This Fan may only be attached to your Sakura Miko, and you may attach any number of this Fan to one holomem.

When you roll dice as part of the Abilities or Arts of the holomem with this Fan attached, you may Archive this Fan for the following effect: re-roll all dice rolled as part of this ability.

This Fan may only be attached to your Akai Haato, and you may attach any number of this Fan to one holomem.

During your opponent's turn, when the holomem with this Fan attached is Downed, you may send 1 Blue Cheer from your Archive to one of your holomems named Fuwawa Abyssgard.

This Fan may only be attached to your Fuwawa Abyssgard or Mococo Abyssgard, and you may attach any number of this Fan to one holomem.

When the holomem with this Fan attached uses an Art, this Fan is treated as 1 Purple Cheer.

The Arts of the holomem with this Fan attached lose -10 power.

This Fan may only be attached to your Robocosan, and you may attach any number of this Fan to one holomem.

The Baton Pass Cheer cost of the holomem this is attached to is reduced by 1 colorless Cheer.

This Fan may only be attached to your Inugami Korone, and you may attach any number of this Fan to one holomem.

During your opponent's turn, when the holomem with this Fan attached is Downed, you may move 1-2 Yellow Cheers from that holomem to another of your holomems named Tsunomaki Watame.

This Fan may only be attached to your Tsunomaki Watame, and you may attach any number of this Fan to one holomem.

(Once per turn) When the holomem with this Fan attached received Cheer, their Arts gain +10 power until the end of this turn.

This Fan may only be attached to your Ayunda Risu, and you may attach any number of this Fan to one holomem.
